title: Neilson Powless, USA’s Next Classics King? ‘I’m Closing the Gap to Van Der Poel, Van Aert’
content:
Powless kick-starts classics campaign at Strade Bianche with Van Aert, Van der Poel, and a victory in his sights.

Read the full article at Neilson Powless, USA’s Next Classics King? ‘I’m Closing the Gap to Van Der Poel, Van Aert’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
